item.title: Builds
item.description: All Github Releases Release Download Git Message Conversations - May 21, 2020 [685e01e] give TonManager control over audio mode to play dial tones on earpiece. fixes #3738 Conversations - May 21, 2020 [a2a7256] disable hardware AEC on some devices. fixes #3734 Conversations - May 21, 2020 [de941f6] use escaped jid for invites Conversations - May 20, 2020 [bfeebc1] invalide options menu after pinning/unpinning.
